Name: Delegate Mailbox Access
Description: Give user/s access to a mailbox

Name: Remove Mailbox Access
Description: Remove user/s access to a mailbox

Name: Delegate Calendar Access
Description: Give user/s access to a calendar

Name: Remove Calendar Access
Description: Remove user/s access to a calendar

Name: Check Mailbox Access
Description: Runs a report to check which users have access to what mailboxes

Name: Check Mailbox Size
Description: Runs a report to check the size of all mailboxes

Name: Check Licensed Users
Description: Runs a report to check all users who are actively licensed

Name: Check Specific License
Description: Runs a report to check who has been assigned a specific license

Name: Install Exchange Online PS Module
Description: Installs the v3 Exchange Online Management Powershell module

Name: Install Partner Center PS Module
Description: Installs the 365 Partner Center PS module

Name: Install RSAT Module
Description: Install the RSAT module and all related tools
